content: princess charlotte s baby bonnet by sarah lehto materials fingering weight yarn approximately 150 175 200 yds/137 160 183 m 24 to 32 /60 to 80cm circular needles for knitting back and forth and around corners in sizes us3/3 25mm and us2/2 75mm or size to obtain gauge tapestry needle safety pin small amount of scrap yarn small crochet hook for provisional cast on 1 gauge 26 sts and 48 row = 4 /10cm in garter stitch on larger needles sizes newborn 3-6 months 6-12 months abbreviations st s - stitches k2tog - knit 2 together k - knit co - cast on p - purl bobble - bind off pm - place marker sm - slip marker yo - yarn over sk2p - slip 1 knitwise knit 2 pass slipped stitch over links to special techniques provisional cast on - https //www stitchdiva com/tutorials/knitting/provisional-cast-on directions with scrap yarn and larger needles co 29 31 33 sts using the provisional cast on of your choice i use a crocheted chain switch to project yarn row 1 p2 k3 p2 twice pm sm on subsequent row k17 19 21 row 2 k17 19 21 sm k2 p3 k2 twice row 3 p2 sk2p p2 twice sm k17 19 21 row 4 k17 19 21 sm k2 p1 yo p1 k2 twice repeat these 4 row until you have 27 29 31 eyelet holes work row 1 and 2 once more place your live sts on a holder or scrap yarn and break yarn leaving a long enough tail to weave in later 2 with right side facing still using larger needles and going across the long cabled edge of your work pick up and k54 58 62 sts *note the picture below shows the sts picked up and the first row of the crown decrease section with markers placed completed decrease for crown row 1 k20 21 22 pm k14 16 18 pm k2tog k18 19 20 row 2 k19 20 21 sm k14 16 18 sm k2tog turn leaving sts on left hand needle unworked row 3 k1 sm 14 16 18 sm k2tog turn repeat row 3 until you have consumed all but 1 st to the left and right of your center sts 16 18 20 sts total hem you will have just completed a right side row and your held sts from the last section will be directly to the left of your working yarn see picture place the 29 31 33 held sts onto your left hand needle and k across these sts turn change to smaller needles now and p back across the row until you reach the provisional cast on unzip the cast on and place the 29 31 33 sts onto your left hand needle p across these sts 74 80 86 sts 3 starting with a k row work in stockinette st for 4 row p across the right side row to create a turning ridge for the hem starting with a
